vsParam:
You must've seen lots of items...
How do you like this one, Nelke?

Hehe, it's really interesting. There are same places in different worlds,
and there are also different places in the same world...

I kind of feel that I've finally touched on the edge of
alchemy's essence. To be honest, I don't think I could use alchemy...

Haha...
Indeed, alchemy is particular about its users...

For example, my alchemy is called "Antique",
which is almost unknown to everyone...

Never mind.
You'll get better at it if you keep trying!

Oh, right!
Many people are learning "Modern" alchemy...

Oh? People are all learning alchemy...
Rorona Sensei said no one except me... Oh, forget it.

Ahem! Do not discuss something dangerous! Let's start
the next lesson of "Peppermint's Alchemy Dojo"!

Yeah, as a qualified alchemist, we need eyes
that could tell good ingredients from bad ones!

Right. Because we can't synthesize anything
without ingredients.

Yeah, but how are we supposed to finish the assignment?
Nelke is powerful, but to do this alone is a bit...

Yeah, don't worry about that!
I asked for the help of a powerful helper! Hey——

Coming! I'm Helper A, Wilbell! I came here so fast
on hearing Master Peppermint's summoning!

I'm Hel... Helper B... Sterk.
At your service... Master Peppermint... Hmm.

Oh——Come on, don't be so stiff~ Sterk!
You should be brisk and neat now!

Hmm, even so...
I'm not good at this...
Haha. Anyway... my helpers are Wilbell and Sterk!

They will be my guards. Nelke, try your best to learn
how to distinguish ingredients from [px]!
I'll try my best to teach her!
I may not be able to teach her...

Wow~ I'm so looking forward to it!
I want to join you too~

No way, Escha, Totori, you have other work to do!
So... please stay at home!

Got it——
See you... Guys, have a safe trip!

Thank you, Totori.
So, let's go!
